data.name: Heliborne - Soundtrack and Goodies
data.detailed_description:
This content pack let’s you stay in the world of helicopter warfare even when you’re not playing Heliborne. Listen to those high-energy tunes and get the oil pumping while reading the extended manual and looking at those beautiful machines the posters!

This pack includes:
  • Original soundtrack from the game in high-bitrate MP3 and FLAC formats
  • An extended manual
  • Two posters showcasing helicopters available in the game.

The soundtrack will be downloaded to Heliborne\Soundtrack_and_Goodies\soundtrack and it contains tracks:
01. Main Theme
02. Calm Before The Storm
03. The Time Is Nigh
04. Air Maneuvers
05. Night Time is the Right Time
06. Out of Sight
07. It's Not Painless
08. They See Us
09. Armistice
10. Freedom Anthem
11. Sway Me Low
12. Fire At Night
13. Hot and Wet
14. Rockin' Rockets
15. Run Boys Run
16. Like a Thief
17. Let's Get This Done
18. Lost in the Sand
19. In the Caves
20. Mirage
21. Serpentine
22. Sleepy Beast
23. The Raid
24. Bleeding Oil
25. Keep Her Steady
26. Slow is Smooth, Smooth is Fast
27. And Dream of Fuel
28. I Have You Now
29. Terrible Damage
30. Raman's Dance
31. Cheerful Destruction
32. Say Goodbye

data.short_description: This content pack let’s you stay in the world of helicopter warfare even when you’re not playing Heliborne. Listen to those high-energy tunes and get the oil pumping while reading the extended manual and looking at those beautiful machines the posters!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: 2.3 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Integrated

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Mountain Lion 10.8.5
  • Процессор: 2.3 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Integrated

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 12.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Процессор: 2.3 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Integrated
